idea:
We manufacture clear transparent plastic boxes and thermoformed blisters (PVC BOX, PET BOX, PP BOX & Thermoforming TRAYS), Face Shield, Industrial Vacuum Forming Tray and provide best solution to various industries.

We believe in quantity of quality, customer satisfaction, and competitive prices resulting the same we have achieved our growth to next level.

Our products appeals to million people thereby resulting in superior sales to our customer & in a manner we play role of silent salesmen.
name: PPS PLAST LLP

idea:
We are a non-profit initiative functioning at the grassroot level using sports as a cohesive and flexible tool to foster individual and community development.

We are +300 volunteers strong and have a presence across 33 cities actively involved in collaborative programs with TATA, Teach for India, Unnat Bharat Abhiyan-IIT Bombay.

We have several flagship programs centered around the SDG's 3,5,12 and 17 of the United Nations 2030 Agenda. Our vision is to positively impact 1 million individuals by the end of 2022.

You can further know more about us at: http://www.playandshine.in
name: Play and Shine Foundation

idea:
Openhaus is the next generation interface for home buying.  We have developed a hyper-real and interactive 3d sales visualization tool for real estate developers to bring future spaces to life, virtually. 

Our software places the consumer at the center of our curated experience, and enables real time interaction with the property, efficient decision making, quicker turn around times and allows increasing points of sale. 

We are the one-stop-shop for everything digital in the real estate industry.
name: OPENHAUS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Having registered in 2015 the company is into management of ships which requires deployment of trained manpower (sailor), vessel's operation and its maintenance. presently managing six ships.
name: HOGER OFFSHORE AND MARINE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Urban India is constantly looking for avenues to reconnect with their roots! Spice Story brings home for its customers, the sentiment of traditional tastes in a modern sauce format with our Range of Chutneys curated from different regions of the country.

 

Currently, there is no organized player who offers a variety of Chutney flavours in India. Spice Story addresses this gap with an Authentic and curated flavours in a convenient flip top bottle and long shelf life!

 

We aspire to be a part of 70 million Kitchens across Urban & semi urban India by end of 2025 & have already made some excellent in roads into key Modern format accounts across cities of Mumbai, Bangalore, Hyderabad & Kolkata.
name: GLOBALVALUE FOOD AND CONDIMENTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Healthcare technology startup enabling telepathology through digitization of microscopy
